title: Merits Behind the Rainy Season
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>*sigh*....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>What’s wrong, Umi-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I’ve just been thinking that it’s raining again....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Aaah, we’ve entered the rainy season after all, huh.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Part of me knows that it can’t be helped, but I also feel like it’s a waste of time because we cannot practice.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>You’re right.... Then, why don’t we think of some training that we can do indoors?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Some training that we can do indoors, you say?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Yeah. Now that we can’t practice outdoors, we’ve got an opportunity to improve on indoor training such as muscle training. We may also make it harder than usual to make up for not being able to practice outside.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Dia.... That’s a wonderful idea! Let’s do it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu, if that’s the case, then let’s talk to Kanan-san about it too♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
